name: Swain
title: the Noxian Grand General
lore: Jericho Swain is the visionary ruler of Noxus, an expansionist nation that reveres only strength. Though he was cast down and crippled in the Ionian wars, his left arm severed, he seized control of the empire with ruthless determination… and a new, demonic hand. Now, Swain commands from the front lines, marching against a coming darkness that only he can see—in glimpses gathered by shadowy ravens from the corpses all around him. In a swirl of sacrifice and secrets, the greatest secret of all is that the true enemy lies within.
blurb: Jericho Swain is the visionary ruler of Noxus, an expansionist nation that reveres only strength. Though he was cast down and crippled in the Ionian wars, his left arm severed, he seized control of the empire with ruthless determination… and a new...
allytips: If you're having trouble rooting an enemy with Nevermove, try throwing it at opponents when they are near their minions so the explosion surprises them.
While laning, try to use Death's Hand's piercing damage to damage opponents from a safe distance.
Vision of Empire is quite difficult to land on its own, look for skirmishes around the map where enemies may be distracted or crowd controlled so you can land it more easily.
Demonic Ascension may make Swain very hard to kill but he's pretty easy to get away from. Try building items that can slow opponents to keep them in range if their mobility is overwhelming.
enemytips: Swain's passive is very potent if you are immobilized. Make sure to be extra careful around enemies who have immobilizing effects.

High mobility counters all of Swain's basic abilities: Death's Hand does more damage the closer he is, Vision of Empire has a very long delay and Nevermove must start returning back to him to be dangerous.
Buying an item with Grievous Wounds will make Swain much easier to kill during his Demonic Ascension.

riot_spell_q.name: Death's Hand
riot_spell_q.description: Swain unleashes several bolts of eldritch power that pierce through targets killed. Enemies hit take more damage for each bolt they are struck by.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
Swain unleashes {{ e5 }} bolts of eldritch power that strike the first enemy they hit and pierce through enemies they kill. Enemies hit take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, plus {{ e2 }}% per additional bolt. Max Damage: {{ f2 }}.

Each unit killed by Death's Hand restores {{ f1 }} Mana ({{ e4 }}% max mana).

riot_spell_w.name: Vision of Empire
riot_spell_w.description: Swain opens a demon eye that deals damage and slows enemies. Champions hit are revealed and also grant Swain a Soul Fragment.
riot_spell_w.tooltip:
Swain opens a demon eye up to {{ castrange }} range away that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slows for {{ e4 }}% for {{ e7 }} seconds.

Champions hit grant Swain a Soul Fragment and are revealed for {{ e9 }} seconds.

Damage is reduced by {{ e6 }}% against minions.

riot_spell_e.name: Nevermove
riot_spell_e.description: Swain launches a wave of demonic power forward. It then returns to Swain and roots enemies it hits.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Swain launches a wave of demonic power, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to enemies it passes through.

Swain then commands the wave to return, detonating it on the first enemy hit. Enemies hit take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are rooted for {{ e3 }} seconds.

riot_spell_r.name: Demonic Ascension
riot_spell_r.description: Swain transforms into a demon and drains health from the 3 closest enemy champions. After draining enough health, Swain can cast Demonflare to end his transformation and decimate nearby enemies with a nova of soulfire.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Swain frees the demon within for {{ demonformduration }} seconds, gaining {{ basehealthgain }} health. Every second, he drains the 3 closest enemy champions for {{ damagecalc }} magic damage, healing him for {{ healingcalc }} health. After draining {{ f7 }} health, Swain gains the ability to cast Demonflare.

Demonflare: Swain unleashes a nova of soulfire dealing magic damage and ending his transformation. Damage per Soul Fragment: {{ damagepersoulcalc }}.

Current Damage: {{ f3 }}
Max Damage: {{ f2 }}

Swain can drain non-champions to heal for {{ minionmonsterhealreduction*100 }}% of the normal amount.

riot_spell_i.name: Ravenous Flock
riot_spell_i.description: Swain's ravens collect Soul Fragments that heal him. Swain can right-click an immobilized enemy champions to pull them closer to him, dealing damage and ripping out a Soul Fragment.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Ravenous Flock
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate - Ravenous:}} '''Swain''' can periodically target a nearby {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} enemy [[champion]] to rip out a {{as|Soul Fragment|buzzword3}} from them, dealing {{pp|20 to 105}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} and {{tip|airborne|pulling}} them 290-units towards him. If the target would be brought past '''Swain''', they are instead {{tip|airborne|knocked back}} the excess distance.
wikia_skill_i1.description2: Enemy champions also leave behind a {{as|Soul Fragment|buzzword3}} for 16 seconds upon [[death]], which can be harvested after 1 second if '''Swain''' is near them.
wikia_skill_i1.description3: {{sbc|Innate - Flock:}} '''Swain's''' ravens bring nearby {{as|Soul Fragments|buzzword3}} to him, {{sti|healing|link=true}} him for {{as|{{pp|3|key=%|4 to 7|1 to 11}} of his '''maximum''' health}} and restoring {{as|{{pp|3|key=%|4 to 7|1 to 11}} of his '''maximum''' mana}}. Each {{as|Soul Fragment|buzzword3}} collected permanently increases his {{as|'''maximum''' health by 5}}.
wikia_skill_i1.notes:
* The crows carrying the souls will only be seen by the enemies if they have {{tip|sight|vision}} of '''Swain'''.
* The pull will not interrupt {{tip|channel|channels}}.
* [[Decoys]] count as champions for dropping {{as|Soul Fragments|buzzword3}}.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Death's Hand
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Swain''' unleashes five bolts of eldritch power in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies in a cone. Enemies can be hit by multiple bolts, taking '''bonus''' [[damage]].
wikia_skill_q1.description2: Bolts stop on impact with enemy champions.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Vision of Empire
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Swain''' summons a demonic eye at the target area, {{tip|sight|revealing}} it for 2 seconds, which explodes after {{fd|1.5}} seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies hit, halved against minions, and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for {{fd|2.5}} seconds.
wikia_skill_w1.leveling:
{{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|100 to 300}} {{as|(+ 70% AP)}}|Reduced Damage|{{ap|100/2 to 300/2}} {{as|(+ 35% AP)}}}}
{{st|Slow Strength|{{ap|25 to 65}}%}}
wikia_skill_w1.description2: Enemy champions are {{tip|sight|revealed}} for an additional duration and have a {{as|Soul Fragment|buzzword3}} ripped from them.
wikia_skill_w1.notes:
* Even if [[spell shield]]ed, Swain will still acquire the {{as|Soul Fragments|buzzword3}}.
* Enemies are able to see the VFX and hear the SFX of ''Vision of Empire'' through the [[fog of war]].

wikia_skill_e1.name: Nevermove
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Swain''' launches a demonic wave in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies it passes through.
wikia_skill_e1.description2: Upon reaching its maximum distance, the wave returns to '''Swain''', detonating at the first enemy hit, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies and {{tip|root|rooting}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.

wikia_skill_r1.name: Demonic Ascension
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Swain''' frees the demon within for 12 seconds, gaining  {{as|{{sti|health|'''bonus''' health}}}} and doubling the health gained from {{as|Soul Fragments|buzzword3}}.
wikia_skill_r1.description2: While ''Demonic Ascension'' is active, '''Swain''' drains all nearby enemies, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to them each second, and {{sti|healing|link=true}} himself for each enemy hit, reduced by 90% against [[minion]]s and [[monster]]s.
wikia_skill_r1.leveling2:
{{st|Damage per Second|{{ap|420/12 to 780/12}} {{as|(+ {{fd|14.167}}% AP)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|420 to 780}} {{as|(+ 170% AP)}}}}
{{st|Heal per Second|{{ap|20 to 50}} {{as|(+ 16% AP)}}|Reduced Healing|{{ap|20*0.1 to 50*0.1}} {{as|(+ {{fd|1.6}}% AP)}}|Maximum Single-Champion Heal|{{ap|20*12 to 50*12}} {{as|(+ 192% AP)}}|Maximum Single-Minion Heal|{{ap|20*12*0.1 to 50*12*0.1}} {{as|(+ {{fd|19.2}}% AP)}}}}
wikia_skill_r1.description3: After draining any amount of health with ''Demonic Ascension'', '''Swain''' can end its effects early to cast {{ai|Demonflare|Swain}}, and automatically does so at the end of its duration.
wikia_skill_r1.description4: If '''Swain''' dies during the channel time of ''Demonic Ascension'', the cooldown is fully refunded.
wikia_skill_r1.notes:
* ''Demonic Ascension'' can drain stealthed enemies.
* {{ai|Demonic Ascension}} persists through revival effects (e.g {{ii|Guardian Angel}}, {{ai|Chronoshift|Zilean}}).

wikia_skill_r2.name: Demonflare
wikia_skill_r2.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Swain''' releases a nova of energy, dealing a base amount of {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies plus 75% of the health drained during {{ai|Demonic Ascension|Swain}}, with the total damage capped.
wikia_skill_r2.leveling: {{st|Minimum Damage|{{ap|100 to 200}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|200 to 400}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}}}
wikia_skill_r2.notes: * ''Demon Flare'' passes through champions. Effects like {{cai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} and {{cai|Unbreakable|Braum}} will block the portion of the nova they intercept.
